Articles.Content:
Acquires Mechanical engineering Major.

Inserts a freezer.

Gets a *"Smart"* freezer

\*Inserts a refrigerator\*

Receives melted Ice cream.

Inserts a spider.

You get a scorpion!

Insert a toothpick

Receives a piece of floss.

Inserts a steak.

Receives a piece of raw meat.

Inserts a coin on a string.

Receives a Samsung Note 7.

Inserts a Huawei Mate X.

(Hopes for Samsung Galaxy Fold in return)

Spoiler

(I prefer Samsung over any smartphone brands)

**Edited <time datetime="2019-04-15T10:37:55Z" title="04/15/2019 10:37  AM" data-short="5 yr">April 15, 2019</time> by FahmiRBLXian**

Receives the authentic, not counterfeit, Samsunga Lacksey Folder,

Inserts an accretion disc.

Receives a vinyl disc that plays **Rick Astley - Never Gonna Give You Up**

Inserts RM2.

(Ringgit Malaysia, or MYR (Malaysian Ringgit) alternatively).

RM1 = US$0.24

**Edited <time datetime="2019-04-15T13:38:20Z" title="04/15/2019 01:38  PM" data-short="5 yr">April 15, 2019</time> by FahmiRBLXian**

Receives R2D2.

Inserts a piece of wire.

Gets a live wire. ~~(No, like a ALIVE wire...)~~

Insert's a wire cutter.

Receives a short circuit.

Inserts a long circuit.

Recieves middle sized circuit.

Insert KSP 1.7

**Edited <time datetime="2019-04-15T16:41:44Z" title="04/15/2019 04:41  PM" data-short="5 yr">April 15, 2019</time> by Gapone**

recieves a wire.

inserts a swordfish

Receives a trained swordish.

Inserts a riflefish.

Receives an assault rifle and a fish.

Inserts Mallets Mortar.

Receives a small-ish cannon.

Inserts Dres.

Gets Jool.

Insert hugs

Gets bugs.

Inserts bone.

Receives bone (At the coin return container, then the machine says "Currency Not Valid")

Inserts RM5.00

(Refer to my earlier post for exchange rate)

Receives nothing, Machine is broken.

Inserts a metal ruler.

Receives RM4.50 (Literally the average (?) price tag for metal rulers in my area).

Inserts RM50 note.

![scan0011.jpg](https://nazzcollection.files.wordpress.com/2010/06/scan0011.jpg)

**[SAMPLE]**

RM 1 =

- US$ 0.24
- IDR 3,410.74

Receives confetti. Because nobody repaired the broken vending machine.

Inserts a slick and flexible plastic card.

Receives **"** **ERROR 575 (STS, Sorry To Say) OSW WAT ARE U INSERTING"**

Inserts key into keyhole to repair, inserts new computer system, does refurbishment.

Receives/faces a legal action from the vending machine manufacturer for the unauthorized access to the commercial equipment.

Inserts a ~~chewing~~ chewed gum into the keyhole.
